title: The SQUID GIRL
content:
The SQUID GIRL is a gear brand in Splatoon. Unlike other brands, it does not affect secondary abilities in any way.

The SQUID GIRL's gear is based on the outfit of the titular character of Japanese comic manga series Squid Girl.

- 1 Gear

- 2 Gallery

- 3 Trivia

- 4 Names in other languages

For the category page, see Category:The SQUID GIRL.

- Promotional image of female and male versions of the SQUID GIRL Gear.

- A female Inkling wearing the SQUID GIRL Gear.

- Back view.

- A male Inkling wearing the SQUID GIRL Gear.

- Back view.

- Official art of an Inkling wearing the SQUID GIRL Gear.

- Since this brand makes one set, the only abilities it has are Opening Gambit, Damage Up, and Swim Speed Up.
